name: A pair of mephitic gloves
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'herb mixing'.
The gloves exude a catalytic vapor that potentiates toxins.
